title: Cover, 1973-45-2, ca. 1870
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: patchwork of woven fabric and ribbons, embroidery
description: Patchwork cover made from a variety of woven fabrics and ribbons. Diamond shape in the center with a triangle on each side to form a central square surrounded by twelve squares plus an outer border. Each square contains an embroidered naturalistic flower.
